# Gene Set Enrichment Analysis for WGBS Data
In this project, we will analyze DNA methylation patterns using `methylGSA` on WGBS data to identify enriched gene sets.

```{r}
options(repos = c(CRAN = "https://cran.rstudio.com/"))
```


```{r, results="hide", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#installation
if (!requireNamespace("BiocManager", quietly = TRUE))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
    
BiocManager::install("ChAMPdata")
BiocManager::install("ChAMP")

#Installing dependencies
install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("YuLab-SMU/ggtree")
BiocManager::install(c("enrichplot", "clusterProfiler", "methylGSA"), dependencies = TRUE)
```

```{r, results="hide", message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ChAMP)
tools::package_dependencies("methylGSA", recursive = TRUE)
library(methylGSA)
```
